Class: SummaryPHPUnitResultFormatter

Source Location: /tasks/ext/phpunit/formatter/SummaryPHPUnitResultFormatter.php

Class Overview

PHPUnitResultFormatter
   |
   --SummaryPHPUnitResultFormatter

Prints short summary output of the test to Phing's logging system.


Author(s):

  • Michiel Rook <michiel.rook@gmail.com>
